description.raw:
Loading configs

* Default config tags of ‘visible’, ‘scene’ and ‘title’ will be parsed by all display plugins individually in the DisplayPlugin base class' `Load` \(not ‘engine’ because ogre is required at the moment, e.g. because of [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/69](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/69/add-setvisible-for-visual/diff)\)
* Custom configs can be passed through to display plugins via their `Initialize` method. GridDisplay, for example, can have the colour etc of its grid customised.

Saving configs

* General config properties are saved in `DisplayPlugin::Config`
* Custom configs can be saved by specifying e.g. `GridDisplay::CustomConfig`.

Tests have been added to check that the same state of e.g. GridDisplay can be reloaded after modifying the grid’s properties.
description.html:
Loading configs

  • Default config tags of ‘visible’, ‘scene’ and ‘title’ will be parsed by all display plugins individually in the DisplayPlugin base class' Load (not ‘engine’ because ogre is required at the moment, e.g. because of #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/69)
  • Custom configs can be passed through to display plugins via their Initialize method. GridDisplay, for example, can have the colour etc of its grid customised.

Saving configs

  • General config properties are saved in DisplayPlugin::Config
  • Custom configs can be saved by specifying e.g. GridDisplay::CustomConfig.

Tests have been added to check that the same state of e.g. GridDisplay can be reloaded after modifying the grid’s properties.

title: Loading/saving of display plugin configs
